summary: This bill, the La Paz County Solar Energy and Job Creation Act, authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to convey approximately 3,400 acres of federal land in La Paz County, Arizona, to the county. The conveyance is subject to existing rights and determined terms. The bill mandates fair market value payment, protection of tribal cultural artifacts, and withdrawal of the land from mining/leasing laws. Proceeds from the sale go to the Federal Land Disposal Account. The act aims to facilitate solar energy development and job creation in the county.
